message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between compensating us fairly for our investment and providing you with a competitive advantage at a price point that remains attractive compared to market standards. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can make this valuable asset yours.
